mapper.select:
select distinct t1.buycertnos, t4.projectname as regionname, t3.bldname, t2.cellname, t1.floorname, t1.roomno, t1.buynames, t1.address as houseAddress from arc_houseinfo t1 left join arc_cellinfo t2 on t1.cellno = t2.cellno left join arc_buildinfo t3 on t1.bldno = t3.bldno left join arc_projectinfo t4 on t3.projectno = t4.projectno
where t1.buycertnos is not null and rownum <= 200 order by t1.buycertnos
